events.name: Spring Business Networking Mixer
events.location: Willingboro Community Center, 123 Main St, Willingboro, NJ
events.description: Join local business owners and professionals for an evening of networking, refreshments, and community building.

events.name: Willingboro Farmers' Market Opening Day
events.description: Celebrate the opening day of the seasonal farmers' market featuring fresh local produce, handmade goods, and family-friendly activities.

events.name: Small Business Workshop: Digital Marketing Essentials
events.location: Chamber of Commerce HQ, 456 Commerce Blvd, Willingboro, NJ
events.description: A free workshop providing tips and strategies for small businesses to improve their digital marketing presence.

events.name: Community Clean-Up Day
events.description: Volunteer to help keep our community clean! All ages welcome. Supplies and refreshments provided.

events.name: Annual Chamber Gala & Awards Night
events.location: Willingboro Grand Hotel Ballroom, 789 Celebration Ave, Willingboro, NJ
events.description: An elegant evening recognizing outstanding local businesses and leaders. Includes dinner, awards ceremony, and entertainment.
